fhir:description.value: <languages xml:space="preserve"> <nl-NL>De opleiding beschrijft de hoogst genoten opleiding.</nl-NL> <en-US>Education indicates the highest level of education achieved.</en-US> </languages>

The content is available under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 (see also http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/nl/)</en-US> </languages>

fhir:definition.value: <languages xml:space="preserve"> <nl-NL>Typering van de hoogst genoten opleiding.</nl-NL> <en-US>Indication of the highest level of education achieved.</en-US> </languages>

<languages xml:space="preserve"> <nl-NL>Indien relevant geacht kan middels de toelichting een specificatie van de opleiding (bijv. patient studeert Geneeskunde) worden toegevoegd.</nl-NL> <en-US>If deemed relevant, a specification of the degree program can be provided by means of an explanation (e.g.: patient is in medical school).</en-US> </languages>
